title: [Large-Scale] Project-Based Learning with Virtual Patient Simulations for Strengthening Clinical Reasoning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and leadership experience within organizations
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented training program for managers/leaders in social service organizations, considering smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Participants apply the core stages of clinical reasoning (hypothesis generation-confirmation-differentiation) with 80% accuracy through complex social case analysis.
During team-based virtual patient simulations, learners establish adjustment strategies reflecting peer feedback three or more times in role allocation and decision-making processes.
Learners apply two or more clinical reasoning strategies learned through real-case-based projects to their organizationâ€™s crisis management processes.

resources: Offline workshop kit for team collaboration
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
